item.title: Tanda add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "The more I know of the world, the more I am convinced that I shall never see a man whom I can really love. I require so much!" -- Jane Austen

item.title: Tanda add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "I always deserve the best treatment because I never put up with any other." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Tanda add a quote by William Makepeace Thackeray
item.description: "Which of us is happy in this world? Which of us has his desire? or, having it, is satisfied?" -- William Makepeace Thackeray

item.title: Tanda add a quote by William Makepeace Thackeray
item.description: "A woman with fair opportunities, and without an absolute hump, may marry WHOM SHE LIKES." -- William Makepeace Thackeray

item.title: Tanda add a quote by Stephen Cosgrove
item.description: "Along in Life As you will go Remember the Times When you must say "NO!" -- Stephen Cosgrove

item.title: Tanda add a quote by Stephen Cosgrove
item.description: "The rabbits though and thought. "If we're normal and Leo is normal, then normal is whatever you are!" -- Stephen Cosgrove

item.title: Tanda add a quote by Stephen Cosgrove
item.description: "Tear down your border of thicket and vine creating a free world, yours and mine." -- Stephen Cosgrove

item.title: Tanda add a quote by Stephen Cosgrove
item.description: "As we look around us At our mortal side and sigh Remember a place called Wingsong Then, Lift your Wings and Fly" -- Stephen Cosgrove

item.title: Tanda add a quote by Stephen Cosgrove
item.description: "Short is short and Tall is Tall You are what you are That is All!" -- Stephen Cosgrove

item.title: Tanda add a quote by Stephen Cosgrove
item.description: "A friend cannot be owned That is plain to see Friendships must be shared, Just like our friend, Ruby" -- Stephen Cosgrove

item.title: Tanda add a quote by Stephen Cosgrove
item.description: "When you're feeling lonely and no one is around Remember to look inside yourself and a best friend will be found" -- Stephen Cosgrove

item.title: Tanda add a quote by Stephen Cosgrove
item.description: "You may see all that is around you But you may feel nothing at all. So try and close your eyes so tight And listen to the night time fall." -- Stephen Cosgrove

item.title: Tanda add a quote by Stephen Cosgrove
item.description: "If you see those pretty things that nature likes to show Remember all those seals that sing And leave them there to grow." -- Stephen Cosgrove

item.title: Tanda add a quote by Stephen Cosgrove
item.description: "As you walk, hop, hobble, or wheel Meeting people of different kinds, Remember that being handicapped Is only a state of mind" -- Stephen Cosgrove

item.title: Tanda add a quote by Stephen Cosgrove
item.description: "As you walk through forests or the meadows of your mind, Stop and talk to those you fear Good friendships you may find" -- Stephen Cosgrove

item.title: Tanda add a quote by Stephen Cosgrove
item.description: "...she fell into a long sleep, and dreamed he dreams of the dream tree." -- Stephen Cosgrove

item.title: Tanda add a quote by Stephen Cosgrove
item.description: "Why are you crying?" shivered the otter. "Because I am cold!" shouted the gnome. "Then why are you shouting?" chattered the otter. "Because," yelled the gnome, "when I shout it gets part of the cold from the inside out." -- Stephen Cosgrove

item.title: Tanda add a quote by Stephen Cosgrove
item.description: "So when you're cold From the inside out And don't know what to do, Remember love and friendship, And warmth will come to you." -- Stephen Cosgrove

item.title: Tanda add a quote by Stephen Cosgrove
item.description: "Never judge someone By the way he looks Or a book by the way it's covered; For inside those tattered pages, There's a lot to be discovered" -- Stephen Cosgrove

item.title: Tanda add a quote by Stephen Cosgrove
item.description: "Mistakes are always mistakes, Or so I've heard them say... But if it teaches a lesson, The mistake will go away." -- Stephen Cosgrove

item.title: Tanda add a quote by Stephen Cosgrove
item.description: "So, if you're feeling fat and overweight And feeling oh so blue, Remember that little rag tag mole And what he had Catundra do." -- Stephen Cosgrove

item.title: Tanda add a quote by Michel Faber
item.description: "Few know what year it is, or even that eighteen and a half centuries are supposed to have passed since a Jewish troublemaker was hauled away to the gallows for disturbing the peace" -- Michel Faber

item.title: Tanda add a quote by Michel Faber
item.description: "All along the street, keys rattle in key-holes as each shop's ornate metal clothing is stripped away...It's as if, having unlocked the chastity of shutters and doors, they can't see the point in maintaining any shred of modesty." -- Michel Faber

item.title: Tanda add a quote by Michel Faber
item.description: "Participating in Society in not a thing one can do naturally; one has to rehearse for it." -- Michel Faber

item.title: Tanda add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "When I said I would die a bachelor, I did not think I should live till I were married." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Tanda add a quote by Michel Faber
item.description: "But miracles are not for the asking; they come only when the stern eyes of God droop shut for a moment, and Our Lady takes advantage of His inattention to grant an illicit mercy. God...is an Anglican, whereas Our Lady is of the True Faith; the two of Them have an uneasy relationship, unable to agree on anything, except that if They divorce, the Devil will leap gleefully into the breach." -- Michel Faber

item.title: Tanda add a quote by Charlotte Brontë
item.description: "Flirting is a woman’s trade, one must keep in practice." -- Charlotte Brontë
